content.en_US:
Used for launching rockets built in the [[VAB|Vehicle Assembly Base]]. Accepts electricity and fuels for the currently inserted rocket.

Once a rocket has been fueled and provided with a target [[destination drive|Drive]], you can commit the rocket to launch, which will make the rocket ready to enter if it has a player capsule, or immediately launch it if it has a satellite.

Note that satellite launches require regular drives, not station drives.
